entry.title: Bitcoin ATM
entry.summary: The message is from Fikret AKIN who wants to improve Bitcoin ATM and asking for suggestions. However, the recipient replies that this is the wrong mailing list for such questions as most Bitcoin ATMs are commercial products and don't accept contributors. In case he finds a different one, he should contact them directly. The email also includes a link to download BIRT iHub F-Type - The Free Enterprise-Grade BIRT Server. Lastly, it provides information about the Bitcoin-development mailing list and a link to subscribe to it.
